column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I saw the first picture on yelp and new I had to try it.  I was surprised at how big the menu was
column2: but ultimately settled on the signature french toast with a glass of OJ and a side of chicken sausage.  French toast was awesome
column3: I was worried it might be too sweet
column4: but the mascarpone added a bit of sourness to make it just right. Juice was good
column5: would of been nice to get a little more in the larger size.  The chicken sausage was not very good.  The side came with three links
column6: and two of which had larger chucks of fat
column7: something the size of your nail that I've never seen in sausage.
